items.title: DevOps: Certified Jenkins Engineer

visible_instructors.name: LevelUp360°

items.headline: Jenkins CI/CD Code Pipeline, Jenkins integrations with tools like Docker, Ansible, AWS, GIT & More, Code Pipeline DSLs
objectives_summary: Understand the concepts of DevOps Continuous Inspection, Continuous Integration, and Continuous Deployment, and the difference between them.
Create a multi-stage Jenkins job and visualize the complicated Jenkins build pipeline with Jenkins build pipeline plugin.
Key concepts of DevOps and a Jenkins Continuous Delivery pipeline
